review: This hotel is at least 15 years old and i first visited it about 10 -12 years back.Not much has changed since and the hotel has only improved upon its overall standard of food and room quality . The food is good and so are all the staff. A good hoytel for short business stays.
name: Alok S

review: The hotel is located slightly away from the main market but offers peaceful sorroundings and ambience. The rooms are neat and clean, the staff and service is decent and overall it is a value for stay hotel .
name: Alok S

review: There is another hotel in rudrapur with a similar name-hotel krishna. But this hotel is very good. Slightly away from the main road the hotel offers excellent views from the rooms and the room decor and food quality are commendable. Overall a very good place to stay.
name: Sureka S

review: This is the best hotel. I just love this hotel. The facilities, and the service, all are good here. I would recommend this Hotel to everyone visiting here. This is the best hotel i had ever visited. I would like to visit again
name: Anurag Das

review: I have frequently visited rudrapur for work and have stayed at this hotel many times. The warmth offered by the hotel staff is u paralleled. The room cleanliness, food quality and the location are very good. The price they charge is also very economical.   Overall an excellent place.
name: Alok S

review: Since i like to stay in close vicinity of the market this hotel is ideal for me. The room service, the room cleanliness, food quality are good for the price it charges.   Have stayed there many times and have found the stay pleasant and stress free everytime.
name: Alok S

review: The property is located on the main road in the heart of the city. Rooms are neat and clean. Food and room service are just about Ok. Pricing is very reasonable.All facilities are easily accessible. Small but good hotel.
name: Alok S

review: Business visits take me to Rudrapur very often and this is one place i have stayed which is economical, clean and centrally located. The rooms are neat and clean and the  hotel , being located in the central market area never gives a dull moment. Restaurants, chaat corners and malls ( vishal mall, bigbazaar are close by.A good place to stay.
name: Alok S
